clauses.title: very broad
This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.

clauses.title: Service can block or censor user communications
clauses.description: The service reserves the right, for any or no reason, to refuse to post or reject user communications.

clauses.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
clauses.description: The service can claim ownership on feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted by the users, who may waive their "moral rights" on that feedback.

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

clauses.title: Users have a 6 month time period to take legal action against the service
clauses.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.

clauses.title: personal data is given to third parties
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the serviceâ€™s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties
clauses.description: The Service provides opt-out instructions to the share of (some) personal information with third parties.

clauses.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
The service allows you to use pseudonyms
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

clauses.title: no refund policy
clauses.description: Payments are final and can't be refunded unless required by law.

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

clauses.title: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service
Service does not allow alternative accounts
clauses.description:
Services that do not allow multiple or alternative accounts are covered by this case.
Alternative accounts can contribute to an increased privacy, but can also be used to manipulate discussions and polls and might decrease the trustworthiness of a person.

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

clauses.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
clauses.description: Once users have been permanently banned from this service, they are not allowed to create a new account to keep using the service.

clauses.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
clauses.description: The content you have published on the service may be removed if it infringes copyright.

clauses.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

clauses.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
clauses.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.

clauses.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements
clauses.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.

clauses.title: This service cannot be held responsible for disputes that you may have with other users
clauses.description: You are responsible for the interactions and the disputes that may occur with other users of the Service. In the event of a dispute, you release the Service from all claims resulting from it.
